Server.Name: SphereII SDX
Server.Description:
SDX Test SDX Sample mod that includes DoubleBarrel, Hal's Turrets, Lawn mower, and Michonne's Katana.
Mod pre-generated using Alpha 14.7

Server.Name: SphereII SDX Bigger
Server.Description:
Much Larger SDX Mod A much larger SDX mod, includes CCTV, Hal's Arrows, Lawn Mower, Morte's Farming and Fishing, Ranged Weapons, My Dogs, Stone OVen, TargetDummy, Medieval, and more.
Since this is a larger mod, after the initial download, you will want to click on the Refesh Mods Automatically to skip a re-download.
Mod pre-generated using Alpha 14.7
Also includes a 7D2D Patch, which adds 1-block crouch, remove bloom, and sky fog.
